00087

00090 
00092   void toggleFixed() { _isFixed ^= 1; }
00093

00096 
00098   void setVisited() const { _isVisited = true; }
00099 
00101   void clrVisited() const { _isVisited = false; }
00102 
00104   void toggleVisited() { _isVisited ^= 1; }
00105 
00107   bool isLocked() const { return _isLocked; }
00108 
00110   void lock() { _isLocked = true; }
00111 
00113   void unlock() { _isLocked = false; }
00114 
00116   int getWeight() const { return _weight; }
00117 
00119   void setWeight(int weight) 
00120   { 
00121     assert(weight >= 0 && weight <= FMLimits::maxCellWeight());
00122     _weight = weight; 
00123   }
